    Filterable
    public abstract class DynamicListQueryAdapter<T,​Q,​VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
extends DynamicListAdapter<T,​VH>
implements Filterable
    A DynamicListAdapter to handle the generic data with query.
